q: `` The Late Show with David Letterman .'' David Letterman told Piers Morgan that his show would only take off if a guest punched him on-air- or, even better, if he punched a guest. Howard Stern calls for Hollywood to boycott Jay Leno ( video) Howard Stern ended his third and final segment on Thursday night's Late Show once again pushing for David Letterman to holler back at him off camera: `` Maybe we'll get our relationship on track. I want to say this. I offered my apology and it's sincere. If you trust that I'm somewhat normal now, what we'll do is we'll start by calling each other and then maybe I'll come out to Montana and I'll stare at the wall with you and we'll see what happens. April 4, Google announced in an earnings release that the New York Times reported easily beat Wall Street's expectations. Google announced that Eric Schmidt will serve as executive chairman, advising Page and Google co-founder Sergey Brin and concentrating on deals, partnerships, customers, and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. In a short piece for Harvard Business Review, Eric Schmidt said Google's strategic initiatives are`` all about mobile.'' repays others who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds.`` It's an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government,'' said Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt. It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor.

been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star.`` Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up,'' Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
